function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Possibility of a rebound to pre-pandemic ways leading to increased transmission of contagious diseases.","Impact":"Could result in a resurgence of contagious diseases and increased public health risks.","Mitigation":"Implement strict public health measures and policies to prevent the spread of diseases.","Technologies":"Health monitoring systems, contact tracing apps, and air quality monitoring devices.","People":"General public, healthcare workers, and vulnerable populations.","Owner":"Government, public health organizations, and technology companies."},{"Description":"Lack of long-term behavioral and structural change related to fossil fuel demand and air quality.","Impact":"Continued reliance on fossil fuels could lead to poor air quality and environmental degradation.","Mitigation":"Invest in renewable energy sources, promote green technologies, and enforce environmental regulations.","Technologies":"Renewable energy technologies, air pollution monitoring systems, and emission control devices.","People":"Communities living near industrial areas, environmental activists, and future generations.","Owner":"Environmental organizations, government agencies, and private sector investors."},{"Description":"Lack of political response to warnings of human disaster and resilience in public health and welfare.","Impact":"Inadequate preparedness for future public health crises and humanitarian disasters.","Mitigation":"Strengthen public health systems, invest in disaster preparedness, and enhance social safety nets.","Technologies":"Healthcare management systems, disaster response technologies, and social support platforms.","People":"Vulnerable populations, frontline healthcare workers, and communities at risk of disasters.","Owner":"Government, international aid organizations, and healthcare institutions."}]}
